body_html:
Thanks very much @gunan et al for taking the time to try and reproduce and reply.

The r0.11 branch now works, where it was not before. (Even though I had an uptodate repository and an uptodate docker base image pulled before, but doing it this time it worked).

As an aside, the master branch @ 446b1cb fails with the below error message. It's not stopping me from getting anything working though because r0.11 appears to be building fine.

Step 20 : RUN tensorflow/tools/ci_build/builds/configured GPU     bazel build -c opt --config=cuda tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package &&     bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/pip &&     pip install --upgrade /tmp/pip/tensorflow-*.whl &&     rm -rf /tmp/pip &&     rm -rf /root/.cache
 ---> Running in fe048e7cdc07
/tensorflow /tensorflow
/tensorflow /tensorflow
Can't find swig.  Ensure swig is in $PATH or set $SWIG_PATH.
The command '/bin/sh -c tensorflow/tools/ci_build/builds/configured GPU     bazel build -c opt --config=cuda tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package &&     bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/pip &&     pip install --upgrade /tmp/pip/tensorflow-*.whl &&     rm -rf /tmp/pip &&     rm -rf /root/.cache' returned a non-zero code: 1

body:
Thanks very much @gunan et al for taking the time to try and reproduce and reply.

The r0.11 branch now works, where it was not before. (Even though I had an uptodate repository and an uptodate docker base image pulled before, but doing it this time it worked).

As an aside, the master branch @ 446b1cb fails with the below error message. It's not stopping me from getting anything working though because r0.11 appears to be building fine.

```
Step 20 : RUN tensorflow/tools/ci_build/builds/configured GPU     bazel build -c opt --config=cuda tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package &&     bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/pip &&     pip install --upgrade /tmp/pip/tensorflow-*.whl &&     rm -rf /tmp/pip &&     rm -rf /root/.cache
 ---> Running in fe048e7cdc07
/tensorflow /tensorflow
/tensorflow /tensorflow
Can't find swig.  Ensure swig is in $PATH or set $SWIG_PATH.
The command '/bin/sh -c tensorflow/tools/ci_build/builds/configured GPU     bazel build -c opt --config=cuda tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package &&     bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/pip &&     pip install --upgrade /tmp/pip/tensorflow-*.whl &&     rm -rf /tmp/pip &&     rm -rf /root/.cache' returned a non-zero code: 1
```
